name: Spaccanavi
description:
❗❗ README ❗❗

For a better game experience, I recommend the use of the Chrome browser;

unfortunately, I encountered some audio latency issues with Firefox and this may occur on other browsers.

Ps: still having troubles? Try downloading the executable version!

🎮 CONTROLS 🎮

WASD to move

Mouse to aim

Left Mouse to shoot

Right Mouse to active abilities when available

ESC to pause

🚀 THE GAME 🚀

Spaccanavi is a 2D top-down endless bullet-hell shooter with a space setting. The player controls a spaceship and the game's objective is to survive as many enemies waves as possible.

This is my first Godot game, it took me about 3-4 months of not so constant development, but this is finally here :D

Music, code and most of the assets are made by myself;

This is an open source project, you can find the GitHub repository here:

https://github.com/lucaleonardi/spaccanavi

🧨 FEATURES 🧨

- Seven types of enemies: fight against an horde of endless spaceships!

-  Six unique special abilities: find those pickups around the map and use them during your space journey to help you survive!

- Original Drum 'n' Bass soundtrack: to keep the frenetic rhythm of the game

- Completely open source: go on the repository page and take a look inside the code!

...How many waves will you survive? 😈

Let me know in the comments :D
